programme.title: Frankie
Frankie
programme.desc:
Frankie: Directed by Ira Sachs. With Isabelle Huppert, Sennia Nanua, Ariyon Bakare, Vinette Robinson. Three generations grappling with a life-changing experience during one day of a vacation in Sintra, Portugal, a historic town known for its dense gardens and fairy-tale villas and palaces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8019694/","name":"Frankie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjgwYTIwNWYtMjg4ZS00YTY0LWEzN2YtMzI1NWFlMzFkODM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTgxNDIzMTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three generations grappling with a life-changing experience during one day of a vacation in Sintra, Portugal, a historic town known for its dense gardens and fairy-tale villas and palaces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8019694/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"levybob"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"AS THOUGH EVERYONE WERE READING THEIR LINES","reviewBody":"I saw 'Frankie' today (Oct. 6, 2019) at the Mill Valley Film Festival. A more slow-moving, uninteresting film would be hard to find. Other critics of the film have done a good job of laying out the plot, so I won't take up your time. My low rating is based on the low (lowest) energy that this film puts out. It is as though no one has the energy to show emotion. As though the Portugal heat has had its effect on everyone. But more than anything else the film runs as though it were a table-read; actors with script in hand, doing a first read at a table. The camera work is leisurely at best. This could be a TV soap-opera episode as easily as a theatrical film.

And for that there's no excuse.

Then why, you might ask, the four stars. For Ms. Tomei and Mrs. Hupert, that's why.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1590,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2019-08-28","keywords":"character name as title,one word title,female protagonist,singing,swimming pool","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1866972185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNiZDg5ZTEtYzMwMi00ZWRiLThkZTctYzA5NmE4YTIwZjYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNiZDg5ZTEtYzMwMi00ZWRiLThkZTctYzA5NmE4YTIwZjYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Unfolding over the course of a late summer's day in the fabled resort town of Sintra, Portugal, 'Frankie' follows three generations who have gathered for a vacation organized by the family matriarch (Isabelle Huppert). In this fairy tale setting, husbands and wives, parents and children, friends and lovers -- stirred by their romantic impulses -- discover the cracks between them, as well as unexpected depth of feeling."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001376/","name":"Isabelle Huppert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6451469/","name":"Sennia Nanua"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0048159/","name":"Ariyon Bakare"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0755158/","name":"Ira Sachs"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315467/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029411/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0663541/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0755158/","name":"Ira Sachs"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0951592/","name":"Mauricio Zacharias"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

Sposób na blondynkę
There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: There's Something About Mary: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Cameron Diaz, Matt Dillon, Ben Stiller, Lee Evans. A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0129387/","name":"There's Something About Mary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWFlZjE5OTYtNWY0ZC00MzgzLTg5MjUtYTFkZjk2NjJkYjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0129387/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Chris J."},"dateCreated":"1998-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny, but surprisingly sweet too.","reviewBody":"The shock comedy aside (zipper and hair gel scenes), purposeful unpolitically correct moments (humor at expense of handicapped, animal cruelty), the most surprising thing about this film is it has heart and is rather sweet. It's not the completely nasty, cruel comedy you might have been expecting. There's a nice love story in here too. It's corny and cliche'd and doesn't feel overly cloying because there are enough shockingly funny moments to offset it. The acting is good, the pacing brisk, and the jokes, well... you've heard all about the best ones by now.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":301379,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-07-15","keywords":"love triangle,original story,black man white woman marriage,penis caught in zipper,ejaculation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000369/","name":"Matt Dillon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125803/","name":"Bobby Farrelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268380/","name":"Peter Farrelly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0214036/","name":"Ed Decter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833828/","name":"John J. The story of five Cuban political prisoners who had been imprisoned by the United States since the late 1990s on charges of espionage and murder." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6760876/","name":"Wasp Network","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWJkNjQxMjUtOGNhMC00MjJiLTg4OWQtYTdkNzYxMWE4NDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of five Cuban political prisoners who had been imprisoned by the United States since the late 1990s on charges of espionage and murder.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6760876/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sir_AmirSyarif"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite a mess","reviewBody":"Olivier Assayas' 'Wasp Network' had the opportunity for substantial dramatic material with its fascinating based-on-a-true-story plot and a star-studded cast. programme.title: Palimpsest
Palimpsest
programme.desc:
Palimpsest: Directed by Konrad Niewolski. With Andrzej Chyra, Magdalena Cielecka, Robert Gonera, Tomasz Sapryk. Marek, the main character of "Palimpsest," is a police inspector, a man on the verge of psychological disintegration trying to solve an intricate case. The story is told on two planes. The first one is a crime story, which constitutes the framework of the film. In the course of events, another theme appears - psychological experiences of the main character. Vivid blend of picture with sound and music will draw the audience into the deepest recesses of Marek's mind, making the viewers face questions: What is reality and what is only an illusion? Where is the borderline between the real world and our perception of it? What makes suffering meaningful and what is really important in one's life"?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0805580/","name":"Palimpsest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNDg3Njg2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODk4NTk5Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Marek, the main character of "Palimpsest," is a police inspector, a man on the verge of psychological disintegration trying to solve an intricate case. The story is told on two planes. The first one is a crime story, which constitute","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0805580/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rayanrafay"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intriguing","reviewBody":"This movie is special.

It is a true in-depth study of the mind, and our individual perception's of reality. It can be confusing, and I will admit if there was not a Q&A with the director after the film ended (Toronto Film Festival) I would have given it an 8 or 9 (I failed to understand some of the symbolism). But after hearing his rationale and thought process, I am forced to give it a perfect rating.

The concept is truly intriguing and the story is ambiguous enough for individuals to draw their own conclusions.

If you are weary of common Hollywood fare, this is the perfect movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Thriller"],"datePublished":"2006-08-18","keywords":"police inspector,murder,husband wife relationship,doctor","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161607/","name":"Andrzej Chyra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0162123/","name":"Magdalena Cielecka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0327290/","name":"Robert Gonera"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1407454/","name":"Konrad Niewolski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067099/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023778/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076604/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107013/","name":"Igor Brejdygant"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kochankowie roku tygrysa
Kochankowie roku tygrysa
programme.desc:
Kochankowie roku tygrysa: Directed by Jacek Bromski. With Michal Zebrowski, Li Min, Sun Ji Feng, Wu Fen Xia. The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain shack. The hunter has a beautiful, sixteen year old daughter. Not to tempt fortune, the parents make the girl cut her hair and dress like a boy. But is it enough to prevent feelings from arising between the two?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0484051/","name":"Kochankowie roku tygrysa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3M2Q2MjEtMTk2Ny00OWIyLThjZDMtZjUyZWY0ZjQwNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The year is 1913. Two Poles escape exile and cross the Siberian taiga to China. Crossing the Amur River ends tragically for one of them. The surviving man, unconscious, is found by an old Chinese hunter who takes him to his mountain ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0484051/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"willd-6"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unrefined yet poignant...","reviewBody":"I really didn't have a good idea what this film was about before I viewed it. A Polish-directed/written film set in China with basically an entirely Chinese cast? A bit foreign for me (being from the US), to say the least.

Starting out with the main character Wolski escaping from Russian Siberia into China, you watch as he is taken in by a poor Chinese family consisting of Guo, his wife, and their daughter Song. So far, so good.

However, one night Song gets up from the dinner table and takes some food to Wolski. As soon as she sits down on his bed Guo comes in and knocks the food right out of her hand. From this moment on, Song is never the same, and you will see why.

My main complaint of this movie is that it is slow and lacks focus/direction in the early (after the first 9min) to middle parts. It is a bit slow but luckily it picks up in the last third.

One thing this movie does well is subtlety. Maybe this is a trait of foreign films in general? I am not sure because I haven't seen enough. My recommendation is if you're a fan of or interested in foreign films and enjoy short but sincere romances, then give this film a shot.

Otherwise, it might not be for you. I think I got something out of it, and for an otherwise stoic personality like myself, it definitely touched me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-09-01","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954076/","name":"Michal Zebrowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546399/","name":"Li Min"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2066134/","name":"Sun Ji Feng"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080717/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093398/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jasminum
Jasminum
programme.desc: Jasminum: Directed by Jan Jakub Kolski. With Justyna Bartoszewicz, Grazyna Blecka-Kolska, Marta Dabrowska, Grzegorz Damiecki. The peaceful world of a monastery, in a small town Jasmine, is destroyed by the arrival of monument restorers, Natasha, along with her daughter Eugenia. The legend associated with the monastery bode revelation in him a saint in the near future. Despite initial reluctance, Natasha starts the maintenance of the image stored there. The secrets of the monastery are unraveled: the unhappy lovers bodies placed in the catacombs, the secret elixir of love, created with the smell of the monks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0778749/","name":"Jasminum","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDkyNzM5ZmQtYTFmNi00ZGI3LWI2MjctNzYwMDAwOWM1ZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The peaceful world of a monastery, in a small town Jasmine, is destroyed by the arrival of monument restorers, Natasha, along with her daughter Eugenia. The legend associated with the monastery bode revelation in him a saint in the n","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0778749/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"voron-5"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent!","reviewBody":"Well....to be honest I am a huge fan of Masters Gayos and Peczka so their participation was the main force that made me to get JASMINUM and my God! the movie is AMAZING! From the beginning to the end...I was embraced by a cascade of colors, sounds and scents...yes - SCENTS for as one of previous reviewers said - You can literally FEEL the scent of the mysterious fragrances! I'd compare my impressions to those I got after watching "Amelie Poulain". Sound - amazing Picture - incredible Actors - superb! Without a doubt I can predict a bright future to Polish cinematography if there would be more that one of a kind (IMO - so far) movie I am talking about! \n\nIf you are looking for something different, if you are tired to the all like Hollywood "matrix" movies - JASMINUM is the very right answer!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1277,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-05-05","keywords":"voice over narration,woman beater,sex,scent,runaway groom","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2702136/","name":"Justyna Bartoszewicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088111/","name":"Grazyna Blecka-Kolska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0196449/","name":"Marta Dabrowska"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464383/","name":"Jan Jakub Kolski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464383/","name":"Jan Jakub Kolski"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hitchcock
Hitchcock
programme.desc:
Hitchcock: Directed by Sacha Gervasi. With Anthony Hopkins, Helen Mirren, Scarlett Johansson, Danny Huston. The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0975645/","name":"Hitchcock","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODAwNDI5NjIwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc4ODc2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0975645/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ferguson-6"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Call me Hitch, drop the ...","reviewBody":"Greetings again from the darkness. Here goes: John J McLaughlin wrote this "Hitchcock" screenplay based on Stephen Rebello's book "Alfred Hitchcock and the Making of Psycho", which was based on the filming of the Psycho screenplay from Joseph Stefano, which was loosely based on Robert Bloch's book, which was based on the real life crimes of Ed Gein. Whew! 

It's kind of interesting that Alfred Hitchcock is hot again. His Vertigo recently displaced Citizen Kane as the all-time greatest film. HBO is still running their recent production of "The Girl", which is based on Hitchcock's making of "The Birds" and his unhealthy connection to Tippi Hedren. And now, we get this Hollywood production, supposedly based on the master of suspense. I saw supposedly, because this film plays like it was written by the heirs of Alma Reville, Hitch's long time wife and collaborator. We all knew she worked on his films and contributed ideas, but the film wants you to believe she was the real genius behind the public genius.

The movie is entitled "Hitchcock" and is based on the making of "Psycho", but in fact, it's more the story of Alma and her husband. While there is nothing wrong with that story ... in fact, it is quite interesting and entertaining ... it's just kind of false advertising.

Helen Mirren portrays Alma, and instead of the mousy woman who usually faded into the background, we see a fairly strong and talented woman who goes toe-to-toe with Hitch in her best scene. Sir Anthony Hopkins dons some facial appliances and a fat suit and does a solid job of capturing the odd, creepy, leering, disturbed, insecure genius we recognize as Alfred Hitchcock. He comes across as louder and more in-motion than what we have previously seen. And while director Sacha Gervasi makes it clear that Hitch is not a "normal" guy, he doesn't dwell too much on the blond fixations.

The emphasis on the skills and importance of Alma would be fine were it not so exaggerated. Surely every great director and writer and artist has a muse and/or support system; and, there is no question Alma was a very talented lady, but her strength here bordered on distracting to the overall picture. Especially needless was the storyline of Alma being attracted to screenwriter Whitfield Cook (Danny Huston), who wrote "Strangers on a Train" for Hitchcock.

The Hitchcock humor is allowed to shine through and his battles with Paramount Studio head Barney Balaban (Richard Portnow) and the censorship board (Kurtwood Smith) are excellent. Hopkins finds the humanity under the fat suit and is especially good in his work with Scarlett Johansson (as Janet Leigh) and Jessica Biel (as Vera Miles). I also got a kick out of James D'Arcy as the affected Anthony Perkins and all his quirky mannerisms.

Though this barely qualifies as a story on the making of Psycho, it was chilling to watch the addition of Bernard Herrmann's iconic score added to the shower scene. In fact, Danny Elfman does a nice job of subtly adding a Herrmann-type score to this film. IMDb data; ttnr: 0975645, Title: Hitchcock, --- Description: Hitchcock: Directed by Sacha Gervasi. With Anthony Hopkins, Helen Mirren, Scarlett Johansson, Danny Huston. The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0975645/","name":"Hitchcock","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODAwNDI5NjIwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc4ODc2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0975645/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ferguson-6","dateCreated":"2012-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Call me Hitch, drop the ...","reviewBody":"Greetings again from the darkness. Here goes: John J McLaughlin wrote this "Hitchcock" screenplay based on Stephen Rebello's book "Alfred Hitchcock and the Making of Psycho", which was based on the filming of the Psycho screenplay from Joseph Stefano, which was loosely based on Robert Bloch's book, which was based on the real life crimes of Ed Gein. Whew! 

It's kind of interesting that Alfred Hitchcock is hot again. His Vertigo recently displaced Citizen Kane as the all-time greatest film. HBO is still running their recent production of "The Girl", which is based on Hitchcock's making of "The Birds" and his unhealthy connection to Tippi Hedren. And now, we get this Hollywood production, supposedly based on the master of suspense. I saw supposedly, because this film plays like it was written by the heirs of Alma Reville, Hitch's long time wife and collaborator. We all knew she worked on his films and contributed ideas, but the film wants you to believe she was the real genius behind the public genius.

The movie is entitled "Hitchcock" and is based on the making of "Psycho", but in fact, it's more the story of Alma and her husband. While there is nothing wrong with that story ... in fact, it is quite interesting and entertaining ... it's just kind of false advertising.

Helen Mirren portrays Alma, and instead of the mousy woman who usually faded into the background, we see a fairly strong and talented woman who goes toe-to-toe with Hitch in her best scene. Sir Anthony Hopkins dons some facial appliances and a fat suit and does a solid job of capturing the odd, creepy, leering, disturbed, insecure genius we recognize as Alfred Hitchcock. He comes across as louder and more in-motion than what we have previously seen. And while director Sacha Gervasi makes it clear that Hitch is not a "normal" guy, he doesn't dwell too much on the blond fixations.

The emphasis on the skills and importance of Alma would be fine were it not so exaggerated. Surely every great director and writer and artist has a muse and/or support system; and, there is no question Alma was a very talented lady, but her strength here bordered on distracting to the overall picture. Especially needless was the storyline of Alma being attracted to screenwriter Whitfield Cook (Danny Huston), who wrote "Strangers on a Train" for Hitchcock.

The Hitchcock humor is allowed to shine through and his battles with Paramount Studio head Barney Balaban (Richard Portnow) and the censorship board (Kurtwood Smith) are excellent. Hopkins finds the humanity under the fat suit and is especially good in his work with Scarlett Johansson (as Janet Leigh) and Jessica Biel (as Vera Miles). I also got a kick out of James D'Arcy as the affected Anthony Perkins and all his quirky mannerisms.

Though this barely qualifies as a story on the making of Psycho, it was chilling to watch the addition of Bernard Herrmann's iconic score added to the shower scene. In fact, Danny Elfman does a nice job of subtly adding a Herrmann-type score to this film. I'm not sure if the film will play well with real Hitchcock aficionados, but if you can forgive the Alma slant, it's actually quite interesting and entertaining and kind of a sweet film at its core.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":74174,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-12-14","keywords":"year 1959,1950s,los angeles california,studio executive,censorship board","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2501551129","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTgzODM1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODEzOTk1OA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTgzODM1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODEzOTk1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A love story between influential filmmaker Alfred Hitchcock and wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho in 1959.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0315065/","name":"Sacha Gervasi"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199880/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118469/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0572352/","name":"John J. programme.desc:
The Monuments Men: Directed by George Clooney. With George Clooney, Matt Damon, Bill Murray, Cate Blanchett. An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from Nazi thieves and return them to their owners." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2177771/","name":"The Monuments Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxMjk4NTM1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjg0MjQ3MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from Nazi thieves and return them to their owners.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2177771/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bestcriteria"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Extremely boring","reviewBody":"I was not expecting combat action, or a whodunit type thriller, but I was totally disappointed with the slow pace and the total lack of suspense.

The dialog was not witty or even interesting. The actors are first class, but are wasted. Other reviewers have said that Kate Blanchett steals the show, but there is nothing to steal, and she hardly is in the movie, and when she does appear, we are left with a 'is that all?' feeling. Other characters play their parts as though they were visitors in the set.

There were two or three instances where I was tricked into thinking that something exciting was going to happen, but the subject ended abruptly and the boring and easily anticipated theme was back.

I wanted to like the movie so badly that I was successful in staying awake for about 45 minutes, but then was in and out until the last 20 minutes, where the pace picked up from snail to turtle pace."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128416,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2014-02-26","keywords":"art,art expert,nazi stolen art,1940s,world war two","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1176348697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxMzcyOTExNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDAzMzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxMzcyOTExNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDAzMzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a race against time, a crew of art historians and museum curators unite to recover renowned works of art stolen by Nazis before Hitler destroys them. programme.title: Zieja
Zieja
programme.desc:
Zieja: Directed by Robert Glinski. With Andrzej Seweryn, Mateusz Wieclawek, Zbigniew Zamachowski, Slawomir Orzechowski. The 70s. A Security Service Major wishes to "buy" gullible priest Zieja and turn him into an agent who will discredit the opposition. The priest's interrogations become a natural pretext for a journey through the history of Poland in the twentieth century: from the Bolshevik war of 1920, through World War II, up to modern times. It turns out that the seemingly naive Father Zieja is actually a clever rebel. The world he lived in was unacceptable to him. He was ahead of his time. A lonely journey without a passport to Rome in the 1930s turned into thoughts of a European Union. Performing the Catholic funeral rites of a woman who committed suicide (during the 20s of the past century) was an protest against the church's rules. Proclaiming the slogan "never kill anyone, not even your enemies" during the Second World War, was against patriotic mythologies and foretold future pacifist attitudes. Zieja puts his life and freedom on the line in the name of moral, ethical and religious values in which he believed. The film "Zieja" is rooted in the movement of Polish Catholicism, which is based on high ethical standards, poverty and tolerance, as well as respect and love for other human beings." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10136434/","name":"Zieja","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcyMDNiZDctYjg3OS00OTU2LWE2ZGMtZThjZmM0YmI3NjQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The 70s. A Security Service Major wishes to "buy" gullible priest Zieja and turn him into an agent who will discredit the opposition. The priest's interrogations become a natural pretext for a journey through the history of Poland in","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10136434/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"morrison-dylan-fan"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"The passage of Jan Zieja.","reviewBody":"After having gone to see Tenet (2020) the day before I spoke to a friend on the phone about what other films were coming out. Getting told that the local Odeon were doing a one-off screening of a interesting-sounding Polish Drama later that day,I got set to meet Zieja.

Note:Some spoilers in review.

View on the film:

On opposing sides not only round the table, but also morally, Andrzej Seweryn and Zbigniew Zamachowski set the screen ablaze in Zieja and Grosicki's interrogation sequences, thanks to the stamping of feet frustration Zamachowski gives Grosicki being counted in this psychological duel with a upright, quiet confidence Seweryn has beaming from every word of Zieja.

A important figure sadly not that well known outside of Poland, the screenplay by Wojciech Lepianka spans a impressively compact bio-pic on Jan Zieja, going right back in flashbacks to Zieja's involvement in the Warsaw Uprising,to the 70's,where Zieja's liberal liturgical catches the attention of the Communists secret services.

Based around the interrogation with Zieja and Grosicki, Lepianka's consistent move to flashbacks gives what should be the centrepiece of the title a stop-start atmosphere, where just as tensions are starting to build, Lepianka steps back and enters a flashback.

Rolling up the opening sequence to Grosicki being a slob in bed, director Robert Glinski & cinematographer Witold Plociennik firmly place Zieja on the other side with graceful close-ups and splintered shadows casting a spiritual aura on Zieja.

Closely working with editor Ewa Smal, Glinski stylishly links Zieja's experience at the interrogation table with the horrors he's faced in life,via pristine match-cuts linking the flashbacks and the present into each other,along with eye-catch screen-wipes performed by Zieja walking across the screen to deliver a sermon.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":85,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-08-28","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0786614/","name":"Andrzej Seweryn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5851110/","name":"Mateusz Wieclawek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322894/","name":"Robert Glinski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087308/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049230/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0503287/","name":"Wojciech Lepianka"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 10136434, Title: Zieja, --- Description: Zieja: Directed by Robert Glinski. With Andrzej Seweryn, Mateusz Wieclawek, Zbigniew Zamachowski, Slawomir Orzechowski. The 70s. A Security Service Major wishes to "buy" gullible priest Zieja and turn him into an agent who will discredit the opposition. The priest's interrogations become a natural pretext for a journey through the history of Poland in the twentieth century: from the Bolshevik war of 1920, through World War II, up to modern times. It turns out that the seemingly naive Father Zieja is actually a clever rebel. The world he lived in was unacceptable to him. He was ahead of his time. A lonely journey without a passport to Rome in the 1930s turned into thoughts of a European Union. Performing the Catholic funeral rites of a woman who committed suicide (during the 20s of the past century) was an protest against the church's rules. Proclaiming the slogan "never kill anyone, not even your enemies" during the Second World War, was against patriotic mythologies and foretold future pacifist attitudes. Zieja puts his life and freedom on the line in the name of moral, ethical and religious values in which he believed. The film "Zieja" is rooted in the movement of Polish Catholicism, which is based on high ethical standards, poverty and tolerance, as well as respect and love for other human beings." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10136434/","name":"Zieja","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcyMDNiZDctYjg3OS00OTU2LWE2ZGMtZThjZmM0YmI3NjQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The 70s. A Security Service Major wishes to "buy" gullible priest Zieja and turn him into an agent who will discredit the opposition. The priest's interrogations become a natural pretext for a journey through the history of Poland in","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10136434/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"morrison-dylan-fan","dateCreated":"2020-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"The passage of Jan Zieja.","reviewBody":"After having gone to see Tenet (2020) the day before I spoke to a friend on the phone about what other films were coming out. Getting told that the local Odeon were doing a one-off screening of a interesting-sounding Polish Drama later that day,I got set to meet Zieja.

Note:Some spoilers in review.

View on the film:

On opposing sides not only round the table, but also morally, Andrzej Seweryn and Zbigniew Zamachowski set the screen ablaze in Zieja and Grosicki's interrogation sequences, thanks to the stamping of feet frustration Zamachowski gives Grosicki being counted in this psychological duel with a upright, quiet confidence Seweryn has beaming from every word of Zieja.

A important figure sadly not that well known outside of Poland, the screenplay by Wojciech Lepianka spans a impressively compact bio-pic on Jan Zieja, going right back in flashbacks to Zieja's involvement in the Warsaw Uprising,to the 70's,where Zieja's liberal liturgical catches the attention of the Communists secret services.

Based around the interrogation with Zieja and Grosicki, Lepianka's consistent move to flashbacks gives what should be the centrepiece of the title a stop-start atmosphere, where just as tensions are starting to build, Lepianka steps back and enters a flashback.

Rolling up the opening sequence to Grosicki being a slob in bed, director Robert Glinski & cinematographer Witold Plociennik firmly place Zieja on the other side with graceful close-ups and splintered shadows casting a spiritual aura on Zieja.

Closely working with editor Ewa Smal, Glinski stylishly links Zieja's experience at the interrogation table with the horrors he's faced in life,via pristine match-cuts linking the flashbacks and the present into each other,along with eye-catch screen-wipes performed by Zieja walking across the screen to deliver a sermon.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":85,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-08-28","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0786614/","name":"Andrzej Seweryn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5851110/","name":"Mateusz Wieclawek","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322894/","name":"Robert Glinski"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087308/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049230/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0503287/","name":"Wojciech Lepianka"],"duration":"PT1H50M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Proxima
Proxima
programme.desc: Proxima: Directed by Alice Winocour. With Eva Green, Zélie Boulant, Matt Dillon, Aleksey Fateev. An astronaut prepares for a one-year mission aboard the International Space Station." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7374926/","name":"Proxima","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjkxOTc2M2ItODI4ZC00ZDVmLTg1ZGMtMDczNTYyNzg4Nzk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An astronaut prepares for a one-year mission aboard the International Space Station.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7374926/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaSerf"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uneventful and unremarkable melodrama.","reviewBody":"I was really disappointed with this rather dull, dreary documentary-style story about "Sarah" (Eva Green) who has dreamed since she was a child of going into space. When her opportunity arrives, she must face the rigours of the training, segregation and quarantine which hit her much harder than she had anticipated - and cause her to miss her young daughter, the rather engaging Zélie Boulant ("Stella") dreadfully. The problem with this film is that aside from some pictures of the Kazakh spaceport and some weight-water training, it could be about absolutely anything. Any mother (or, indeed father) who has to dedicate themself unconditionally to a job might reasonably feel the same senses of loneliness and despair and though Eva Green (or rather, her eyes) do manage to convey some of the sheer exhaustion her character might be feeling during this extensive period of preparation, again it could be for an ultra-marathon or a cross-channel swim! It's been a while since I've seen Matt Dillon on screen, and he adds nothing to this vanity project for polyglots.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6646,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-27","keywords":"female astronaut,male astronaut,mother daughter relationship,cat,swimming pool","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2393030169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzZTI0MGEtNzQ3Yy00MTdjLWIyZTYtNjZmYTU0ZWViMGI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzZTI0MGEtNzQ3Yy00MTdjLWIyZTYtNjZmYTU0ZWViMGI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Eva Green gives a career best performance in this epic and emotionally charged new drama from acclaimed director Alice Winocour. Green plays Sarah, a French astronaut training at the European Space Agency in Cologne. The only woman in the arduous programme she has been chosen to be part of the crew of a year-long space mission called ‘Proxima’. Putting enormous strain on her relationship with her daughter (played by outstanding newcomer Zélie Boulant-Lemesle), the training begins to take its toll on both as Sarah’s training progresses and the launch looms ever closer."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5541157/","name":"Zélie Boulant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000369/","name":"Matt Dillon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1356951/","name":"Alice Winocour"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0091516/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0401721/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022869/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1356951/","name":"Alice Winocour"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111379/","name":"Jean-Stéphane Bron"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Love Yarn
A Love Yarn
programme.desc: A Love Yarn: Directed by Peter Burger. With Anna Hutchison, Simon Arblaster, Olivia Tennet, Annie Whittle. The owner of a quaint New Zealand yarn shop, Sophie Markham, gets her world flipped upside down after learning her top supplier of yarn, King Farms, is stopping production. Much to her surprise, the charming yet stuck-in-his-ways Samuel King has traveled all the way from New York to audit the business model of the farm. Desperate to keep her shop going, Sophie convinces Samuel to give her two weeks to learn the ropes of yarn spinning and raise enough money to buy the mill herself. With Samuel's help, Sophie comes up with a fundraising plan to host a "knit-off" and auction at the local makers market. However, when the two weeks come to an end Sophie finds herself at a crossroads of business and romance. Could she have misinterpreted Samuel's growing romantic interest in her as just business all along?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12786794/","name":"A Love Yarn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWI2OWIwODMtNzdhMS00MmFkLWFiMTktNDlkY2MwMzY5MWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The owner of a quaint New Zealand yarn shop, Sophie Markham, gets her world flipped upside down after learning her top supplier of yarn, King Farms, is stopping production. IMDb data; ttnr: 12786794, Title: A Love Yarn, --- Description: A Love Yarn: Directed by Peter Burger. With Anna Hutchison, Simon Arblaster, Olivia Tennet, Annie Whittle. The owner of a quaint New Zealand yarn shop, Sophie Markham, gets her world flipped upside down after learning her top supplier of yarn, King Farms, is stopping production. Much to her surprise, the charming yet stuck-in-his-ways Samuel King has traveled all the way from New York to audit the business model of the farm. Desperate to keep her shop going, Sophie convinces Samuel to give her two weeks to learn the ropes of yarn spinning and raise enough money to buy the mill herself. With Samuel's help, Sophie comes up with a fundraising plan to host a "knit-off" and auction at the local makers market. However, when the two weeks come to an end Sophie finds herself at a crossroads of business and romance. Could she have misinterpreted Samuel's growing romantic interest in her as just business all along?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12786794/","name":"A Love Yarn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWI2OWIwODMtNzdhMS00MmFkLWFiMTktNDlkY2MwMzY5MWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The owner of a quaint New Zealand yarn shop, Sophie Markham, gets her world flipped upside down after learning her top supplier of yarn, King Farms, is stopping production. programme.title: The Corrupted
Skorumpowany
The Corrupted
programme.desc:
The Corrupted: Directed by Ron Scalpello. With Sam Claflin, Timothy Spall, Hugh Bonneville, Noel Clarke. Liam is an ex-con trying to win back the love and trust of his family. Liam's drive for redemption will see him caught up in a web of conspiracy, crime, and corruption." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5687270/","name":"The Corrupted","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTVkNjY5ZWMtMTg0MC00NmZjLWFiYzItNmU0ODViMzhlM2IzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Liam is an ex-con trying to win back the love and trust of his family. Liam's drive for redemption will see him caught up in a web of conspiracy, crime, and corruption.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5687270/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"valleyjohn"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nothing new here but entertaing enough.","reviewBody":"When I saw the trailer for The Corrupted I thought this is right up my street . It's a gangster movie ( my favourite genre) it's set in a part of London I know very well and it has some superb British actors in it such a Tim Spall , Noel Clarke and Hugh Bonneville but did it live up to my expectations?

This is the story of Liam, who wants nothing more than to live a peaceful life and to re-connect with his young son after coming out of prison .He learns his brother is caught up in a dark and dangerous web of corruption with property developer Clifford Cullen (Timothy Spall). In a drive for redemption, Liam risks everything to save his brother and win back the trust of his family.

The first thing to say about this film is that it's relentlessly dark . There is nothing happy or cheerful going on here and there is definitely no humour but that's not necessarily a bad thing in my book.

Tim Spall is fantastic as the gangland boss and Sam Claflin does a great job as our anti hero but I wasn't convinced that Noel Clarke was a copper for one minute .

I have to admit an hour into this I felt like it was going through the motions . Sure , there was lots of action but nothing we hadn't seen many times before . Luckily in the second half of the film it got a lot more interesting and grimmer !

This film seemed to slip under the radar when it was released last year, maybe because of how dark it is but as London gangster movies go it's not too bad at all.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1296,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-05-10","keywords":"love,year 2002,year 2012,east london,reference to 2012 olympic games","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2196225305","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDRkNjc4ZjEtZDkzMS00YjA1LThkNGMtNjMzZmQ1ZTY5MzdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDRkNjc4ZjEtZDkzMS00YjA1LThkNGMtNjMzZmQ1ZTY5MzdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set before the 2012 London Olympics, the film follows Liam (Sam Claflin), an ex-con trying to win back the love and trust of his family. He has lost everything at the hands of a local crime syndicate run by Clifford Cullen (Timothy Spall), who has high-level connections in politics, finance and the police force. Liam's drive for redemption sees him caught up in a web of conspiracy, crime, and corruption."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3510471/","name":"Sam Claflin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001758/","name":"Timothy Spall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0095017/","name":"Hugh Bonneville"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2151723/","name":"Ron Scalpello"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0450149/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0306894/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1319618/","name":"Nick Moorcroft"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

This is the story of Liam, who wants nothing more than to live a peaceful life and to re-connect with his young son after coming out of prison .He learns his brother is caught up in a dark and dangerous web of corruption with property developer Clifford Cullen (Timothy Spall). In a drive for redemption, Liam risks everything to save his brother and win back the trust of his family.

programme.desc:
Rozdroze Cafe: Directed by Leszek Wosiewicz. With Robert Olech, Piotr Glowacki, Cezary Lukaszewicz, Martyna Peszko." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0479261/","name":"Rozdroze Cafe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGJjYTU2NWQtZmUzNy00YTA5LWE3NWMtZDUzNzhiYTIyMGQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0479261/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"temporarybobi"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well done","reviewBody":"I saw this film in Krakow's Kino Pod Baranami. Film was well done. It depicts the misunderstandings among some young polish provincial people, who have the ambitions to crop up in the new post-communist, re-capitalist society.

While the young women in the film are trying to escape the disconsolately life by either getting know established oldsters or by giving birth to numerous children, the young men decide to rob a bank. Things get wrong, one of the guys flips out and kills four people.

The film is supposed to be based on a true story which has happened for about 3-4 years in Warsaw. The screenplay makes use of many clichés, otherwise film is well done."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":143,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-11-11","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2027064/","name":"Robert Olech"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1644158/","name":"Piotr Glowacki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2021835/","name":"Cezary Lukaszewicz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941829/","name":"Leszek Wosiewicz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049230/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941829/","name":"Leszek Wosiewicz"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

Wiera is a beautiful and well-trained agent of the former KGB, sent to Poland to steal the young genius's potion. programme.title: The Monuments Men
Obrońcy skarbów
The Monuments Men
programme.desc:
The Monuments Men: Directed by George Clooney. With George Clooney, Matt Damon, Bill Murray, Cate Blanchett. An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from Nazi thieves and return them to their owners." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2177771/","name":"The Monuments Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMxMjk4NTM1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjg0MjQ3MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from Nazi thieves and return them to their owners.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2177771/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bestcriteria"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Extremely boring","reviewBody":"I was not expecting combat action, or a whodunit type thriller, but I was totally disappointed with the slow pace and the total lack of suspense.

The dialog was not witty or even interesting. The actors are first class, but are wasted. Other reviewers have said that Kate Blanchett steals the show, but there is nothing to steal, and she hardly is in the movie, and when she does appear, we are left with a 'is that all?' feeling. Other characters play their parts as though they were visitors in the set.

There were two or three instances where I was tricked into thinking that something exciting was going to happen, but the subject ended abruptly and the boring and easily anticipated theme was back.

I wanted to like the movie so badly that I was successful in staying awake for about 45 minutes, but then was in and out until the last 20 minutes, where the pace picked up from snail to turtle pace."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128416,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2014-02-26","keywords":"art,art expert,nazi stolen art,1940s,world war two","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1176348697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxMzcyOTExNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDAzMzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxMzcyOTExNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDAzMzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a race against time, a crew of art historians and museum curators unite to recover renowned works of art stolen by Nazis before Hitler destroys them. programme.title: A Love Yarn
A Love Yarn
programme.desc: A Love Yarn: Directed by Peter Burger. With Anna Hutchison, Simon Arblaster, Olivia Tennet, Annie Whittle. The owner of a quaint New Zealand yarn shop, Sophie Markham, gets her world flipped upside down after learning her top supplier of yarn, King Farms, is stopping production. Much to her surprise, the charming yet stuck-in-his-ways Samuel King has traveled all the way from New York to audit the business model of the farm. Desperate to keep her shop going, Sophie convinces Samuel to give her two weeks to learn the ropes of yarn spinning and raise enough money to buy the mill herself. With Samuel's help, Sophie comes up with a fundraising plan to host a "knit-off" and auction at the local makers market. However, when the two weeks come to an end Sophie finds herself at a crossroads of business and romance. Could she have misinterpreted Samuel's growing romantic interest in her as just business all along?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12786794/","name":"A Love Yarn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWI2OWIwODMtNzdhMS00MmFkLWFiMTktNDlkY2MwMzY5MWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The owner of a quaint New Zealand yarn shop, Sophie Markham, gets her world flipped upside down after learning her top supplier of yarn, King Farms, is stopping production. programme.title: The Other Woman
Inna kobieta
The Other Woman
programme.desc: The Other Woman: Directed by Nick Cassavetes. With Cameron Diaz, Leslie Mann, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Don Johnson. After discovering her boyfriend is married, Carly soon meets the wife he's been betraying. And when yet another love affair is discovered, all three women team up to plot revenge on the three-timing S.O.B." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2203939/","name":"The Other Woman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0ODE4ODY1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDA5NjkzMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After discovering her boyfriend is married, Carly soon meets the wife he's been betraying. And when yet another love affair is discovered, all three women team up to plot revenge on the three-timing S.O.B.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2203939/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"amit-naor"},"dateCreated":"2014-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"I might be a man, that was funny","reviewBody":"The movie is kind of the typical woman revenge film and as a man I didn't know how will I react to it, unless a movie try to shove in your face "girls power" I react to female protagonist no different than a male protagonist and the fact that the villain is male also doesn't bother me unless they try to show all of the men as evil monsters, this movie did a good job (until the last scene with the male) not making it feel like girls power because the women character didn't try to be strong and thought but just make them normal women and when it comes to the male, we do see more males in the film and not all of them are "horrible monsters" like "the villain" some of them are nice, funny and even helping them. Some people might not like it, but I see that as a no different movie than any other revenge film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":135412,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2014-04-23","keywords":"revenge,cheating husband,multiple girlfriends,wife meets mistress,extramarital affair","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2422712345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1NDY2NTgyMzZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDUwNTAzODAx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1NDY2NTgyMzZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDUwNTAzODAx._V1_.jpg","description":"After discovering her boyfriend is married, a woman tries to get her ruined life back on track. programme.title: Odio l'estate
Jak ja nienawidzę wakacji!
Odio l'estate
programme.desc: Odio l'estate: Directed by Massimo Venier. With Aldo Baglio, Giovanni Storti, Giacomo Poretti, Lucia Mascino. Three families end up in the same rented house. Throughout the summer, they become friends and rediscover how to enjoy life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10492998/","name":"Odio l'estate","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2Q5ZDdmZWItMmNiYi00MjU5LThmOTAtZDU5N2ZhYmM1NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5OTQzNzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three families end up in the same rented house. Throughout the summer, they become friends and rediscover how to enjoy life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10492998/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"antoniotierno"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"excellent return","reviewBody":"A few years after the not so succesfull experiment of "Fuga da Reuma Park", after the celebrations for 25 years of activity together and after Aldo Baglio had started working alone (that seemed to be the beginning of the end of the Trio), here they go with a surprise new film, bringing the three guys back in the wake of a solid and mature comedy, which gets to speak to the hearts of old fans but maybe also able to conquer new ones. Certainly a bittersweet reflection on the passing of time and the risk of forgetting who we are, the story well written, funny and at times even moving, The film features three unexpectedly excellent first ladies, perfectly at ease in their meeting with Aldo Giovanni and Giacomo as well as the return of their historic director, who still knows how to make the most of their potential.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2261,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-01-30","keywords":"friend","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer [OVS]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3128737305","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA5Y2E2MWUtMTdkYS00NjI3LTg0NzQtNTZmZmQwMjA0MDc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA5Y2E2MWUtMTdkYS00NjI3LTg0NzQtNTZmZmQwMjA0MDc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0017623/","name":"Aldo Baglio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320495/","name":"Giovanni Storti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0316034/","name":"Giacomo Poretti"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0893111/","name":"Massimo Venier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043281/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117688/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0254125/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3291357/","name":"Davide Lantieri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1614496/","name":"Michele Pellegrini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0893111/","name":"Massimo Venier"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Frankie
Frankie
programme.desc:
Frankie: Directed by Ira Sachs. With Isabelle Huppert, Sennia Nanua, Ariyon Bakare, Vinette Robinson. Three generations grappling with a life-changing experience during one day of a vacation in Sintra, Portugal, a historic town known for its dense gardens and fairy-tale villas and palaces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8019694/","name":"Frankie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjgwYTIwNWYtMjg4ZS00YTY0LWEzN2YtMzI1NWFlMzFkODM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTgxNDIzMTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three generations grappling with a life-changing experience during one day of a vacation in Sintra, Portugal, a historic town known for its dense gardens and fairy-tale villas and palaces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8019694/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"levybob"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"AS THOUGH EVERYONE WERE READING THEIR LINES","reviewBody":"I saw 'Frankie' today (Oct. 6, 2019) at the Mill Valley Film Festival. A more slow-moving, uninteresting film would be hard to find. Other critics of the film have done a good job of laying out the plot, so I won't take up your time. My low rating is based on the low (lowest) energy that this film puts out. It is as though no one has the energy to show emotion. As though the Portugal heat has had its effect on everyone. But more than anything else the film runs as though it were a table-read; actors with script in hand, doing a first read at a table. The camera work is leisurely at best. This could be a TV soap-opera episode as easily as a theatrical film.

And for that there's no excuse.

Then why, you might ask, the four stars. For Ms. Tomei and Mrs. Hupert, that's why.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1590,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2019-08-28","keywords":"character name as title,one word title,female protagonist,singing,swimming pool","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1866972185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNiZDg5ZTEtYzMwMi00ZWRiLThkZTctYzA5NmE4YTIwZjYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNiZDg5ZTEtYzMwMi00ZWRiLThkZTctYzA5NmE4YTIwZjYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Unfolding over the course of a late summer's day in the fabled resort town of Sintra, Portugal, 'Frankie' follows three generations who have gathered for a vacation organized by the family matriarch (Isabelle Huppert). In this fairy tale setting, husbands and wives, parents and children, friends and lovers -- stirred by their romantic impulses -- discover the cracks between them, as well as unexpected depth of feeling."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001376/","name":"Isabelle Huppert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6451469/","name":"Sennia Nanua"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0048159/","name":"Ariyon Bakare"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0755158/","name":"Ira Sachs"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315467/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029411/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0663541/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0755158/","name":"Ira Sachs"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0951592/","name":"Mauricio Zacharias"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 8019694, Title: Frankie, --- Description: Frankie: Directed by Ira Sachs. With Isabelle Huppert, Sennia Nanua, Ariyon Bakare, Vinette Robinson. Three generations grappling with a life-changing experience during one day of a vacation in Sintra, Portugal, a historic town known for its dense gardens and fairy-tale villas and palaces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8019694/","name":"Frankie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjgwYTIwNWYtMjg4ZS00YTY0LWEzN2YtMzI1NWFlMzFkODM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTgxNDIzMTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three generations grappling with a life-changing experience during one day of a vacation in Sintra, Portugal, a historic town known for its dense gardens and fairy-tale villas and palaces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8019694/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"levybob","dateCreated":"2019-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"AS THOUGH EVERYONE WERE READING THEIR LINES","reviewBody":"I saw 'Frankie' today (Oct. 6, 2019) at the Mill Valley Film Festival. A more slow-moving, uninteresting film would be hard to find. Other critics of the film have done a good job of laying out the plot, so I won't take up your time. My low rating is based on the low (lowest) energy that this film puts out. It is as though no one has the energy to show emotion. As though the Portugal heat has had its effect on everyone. But more than anything else the film runs as though it were a table-read; actors with script in hand, doing a first read at a table. The camera work is leisurely at best. This could be a TV soap-opera episode as easily as a theatrical film.

programme.title: Il cacciatore
Il cacciatore
Il Cacciatore. Polowanie na mafię
Il Cacciatore
programme.desc:
Il cacciatore: With Francesco Montanari, Miriam Dalmazio, Edoardo Pesce, Francesco Foti. In 1993 Italy was at war with the mafia, this is the story of the servants of the Nation that fought that war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8118950/","name":"Il cacciatore","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU2YzVlMDQtYTRlMy00MGM3LTlhMTUtOWZlZTAzNzJhOTlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTY2MzkxMjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1993 Italy was at war with the mafia, this is the story of the servants of the Nation that fought that war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8118950/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Tweekums"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Hunter (Season One)","reviewBody":"This Italian series tells of the war against the Cosa Nostra in the 1990s; in particular the hunt for Leoluca Bagarella, a senior Mafioso and his associates and a child they are believed to have kidnapped. Saverio Barone, a young prosecutor recently recruited to the Anti-Mafia squad, is among those leading the hunt; a hunt he becomes obsessed with. He is partnered with Carlo Mazza, a more experienced prosecutor. Over the course of the first series we see events from the perspective of these prosecutors; Bagarella and his associates, most notably his driver Tony.

I really enjoyed the first season of this series and hope the second becomes available here soon. The tone is understandably fairly bleak... anybody hoping for the fun of Sicily based crime drama 'Inspector Montalbano' will be sorely disappointed! The series doesn't shy away from showing Mafia crimes; there are some fairly gruelling scenes of torture and murder and as hunt for the boy drags on for months and years with him chained up and his chance of survival not that great there is a sense of bleakness. The opening of each episode reminds us that this is based on real events, but with details changed for dramatic purposes; this helps keep the viewer on edge, especially if like me you don't know how the real story ends. The cast does a really impressive job bringing their characters to life... not 'larger than life'; the Mafiosi are shown as fairly ordinary people who happen to be violent criminals rather than obviously evil villains, which explains why they aren't easily caught. Overall I'd certainly recommend this.

These comments are based on watching the series in Italian with English subtitles.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":624,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-03-14","keywords":"servant","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3036319/","name":"Francesco Montanari"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3933829/","name":"Miriam Dalmazio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3034455/","name":"Edoardo Pesce"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0503595/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044017/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068775/"}]}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 8118950, Title: Il cacciatore, --- Description: Il cacciatore: With Francesco Montanari, Miriam Dalmazio, Edoardo Pesce, Francesco Foti. In 1993 Italy was at war with the mafia, this is the story of the servants of the Nation that fought that war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8118950/","name":"Il cacciatore","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU2YzVlMDQtYTRlMy00MGM3LTlhMTUtOWZlZTAzNzJhOTlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTY2MzkxMjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1993 Italy was at war with the mafia, this is the story of the servants of the Nation that fought that war.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8118950/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Tweekums","dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Hunter (Season One)","reviewBody":"This Italian series tells of the war against the Cosa Nostra in the 1990s; in particular the hunt for Leoluca Bagarella, a senior Mafioso and his associates and a child they are believed to have kidnapped. Saverio Barone, a young prosecutor recently recruited to the Anti-Mafia squad, is among those leading the hunt; a hunt he becomes obsessed with. He is partnered with Carlo Mazza, a more experienced prosecutor. Over the course of the first series we see events from the perspective of these prosecutors; Bagarella and his associates, most notably his driver Tony.

I really enjoyed the first season of this series and hope the second becomes available here soon. The tone is understandably fairly bleak... anybody hoping for the fun of Sicily based crime drama 'Inspector Montalbano' will be sorely disappointed! The series doesn't shy away from showing Mafia crimes; there are some fairly gruelling scenes of torture and murder and as hunt for the boy drags on for months and years with him chained up and his chance of survival not that great there is a sense of bleakness. The opening of each episode reminds us that this is based on real events, but with details changed for dramatic purposes; this helps keep the viewer on edge, especially if like me you don't know how the real story ends. The cast does a really impressive job bringing their characters to life... not 'larger than life'; the Mafiosi are shown as fairly ordinary people who happen to be violent criminals rather than obviously evil villains, which explains why they aren't easily caught. Overall I'd certainly recommend this.

programme.title: Zloto dezerterów
Złoto dezerterów
programme.desc:
Zloto dezerterów: Directed by Janusz Majewski. With Marek Kondrat, Boguslaw Linda, Wiktor Zborowski, Katarzyna Figura. During World War II a group of safe-crackers sets off on a mission to steal gold from a Nazi bank." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0191666/","name":"Zloto dezerterów","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM4OTI4ZGUtNmQyZS00NjZiLWE4OWUtNDA3Y2RkOGE4ZTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"During World War II a group of safe-crackers sets off on a mission to steal gold from a Nazi bank.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0191666/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad sequel to fun movie","reviewBody":"This is a sequel to movie from 1985 – HK Deserters" . The heroes from the first movie also appear here , but there is plenty of new heroes . The first movie was a war comedy about a group of friends running away from army . This one is supposed to be a war comedy about stealing gold from Nazi's.

It was supposed to be comedy . Unfortunately the movie takes itself way too seriously . The movie unnecessary tries to tell something about anti-Semitism , betrayal and courage of freedom fighters. For more than half of the movie is hard to tell that this is comedy . When the so-called jokes appear in the second half of the movie they so awful you will groan. The movie also feels too long (it's 2 hours long ) , which wasn't a problem in the first movie (which was almost 3 hours long) . Gone is the charm and the fun of original.

The acting is good and the music is very jolly . Still , it's too little to save the movie from being a disaster. I give it 1/10. Better watch "Kelly's heroes". Or the original – "HK Deserters".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":491,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"genre":["Action","Comedy","War"],"datePublished":"1998-12-04","keywords":"1940s,world war two","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464945/","name":"Marek Kondrat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511277/","name":"Boguslaw Linda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953975/","name":"Wiktor Zborowski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538105/","name":"Janusz Majewski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538105/","name":"Janusz Majewski"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: Making of "Belfer. Sezon 2"
programme.desc: Publikacja najciekawszych materiałów z planu drugiego sezonu serialowego hitu. Realizatorzy filmu i aktorzy opowiadają o produkcji w niedługich wywiadach, które wzbogacone są ujęciami i kadrami z serialu.
